string.name: catalog_unavailable
string.comment: Notification that the cloud resource catalog can't be updated

resources.string: El catálogo de recursos no está disponible

string.comment: Notification that the resource catalog update will begin

resources.string: La actualización del catálogo inició en segundo plano

string.comment: Notification that the resource catalog update is still downloading

resources.string: El catálogo aún se está descargando; inténtalo de nuevo en un momento.

string.comment: Progress notification that the check for a resource is still running

string.comment: Notification that a keyboard download is still running
